title: Detox Benefits (90)
description: Detoxifying formula combines 15 ingredients including proprietary forms of curcumin, grapefruit seed extract and milk thistle to support liver health and function.*
cleaned_text: Information Suggested Use: As a dietary supplement, take 6 capsules daily for up to 1 month, or as directed by your healthcare practitioner. Detoxification programs are not intended for long term use. Consult your healthcare practitioner if you plan to use the formula for more than 1 month at a time. Keep out of reach of children. Store in a cool, dry place. *This statement has not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.
